titles.title: A bill to extend the duty suspension on Benzoic acid, 3, 4, 5-trihydroxy-, propyl ester.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the duty suspension on Benzoic acid, 3,4,5-trihydroxy-, propyl ester.
